summary: MULTIPLE FAILED ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK ACTUATORS.  TOOK IN UNDER WARRANTY REFUSED TO REPLACE BUT SAID THEY "CLEANED IT"  RIGHT AFTER WARRANTY WAS OVER, IT FAILED AGAIN.  NOW THE PASSENGER SIDE IS FAILING.  THIS IS A KNOW PROBLEM WITH TOYOTA.  EVEN THE SERVICE MANAGER TOLD ME THEY KNEW IT WAS AN ISSUE BUT ARE DOING NOTHING ABOUT IT.
